Uses of Class
org.deidentifier.arx.metric.Metric

Packages that use Metric
org.deidentifier.arx This package provides the public API for the ARX anonymization framework. 
org.deidentifier.arx.metric This package implements several metrics for information loss. 
 

Uses of Metric in org.deidentifier.arx
 

Methods in org.deidentifier.arx that return Metric
 Metric<?> ARXConfiguration.getMetric()
          Returns the metric used for measuring information loss

Uses of Metric in org.deidentifier.arx.metric
 

Subclasses of Metric in org.deidentifier.arx.metric
 class MetricAECS
          This class provides an implementation of the (normalized) average equivalence class size metric.
 class MetricCombined
          A metric that has a default main metric and several auxiliary metrics that are also evaluated
 class MetricDefault
          This class provides an abstract skeleton for the implementation of metrics.
 class MetricDM
          This class provides an implementation of the DM metric (non-monotonic)
 class MetricDMStar
          This class provides an implementation of the DM* metric (monotonic variant of the Discernability Metric).
 class MetricEntropy
          This class provides an efficient implementation of the non-uniform entropy metric.
 class MetricHeight
          This class provides an implementation of the Height metric.
 class MetricNMEntropy
          This class provides an efficient implementation of a non-monotonic and non-uniform entropy metric.
 class MetricPrecision
          This class provides an implementation of the Precision metric.
 class MetricWeighted
          A metric that consists of several metrics that are evaluated and combined by applying weights
